subject: Marathon Match 18 - BlockEditDistance - $5,000 in Prizes!
body:
Hello sm1lies,

The first prize money Marathon Match, 'BlockEditDistance' has begun!  
Read more about this exciting match here:
http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=MatchDetails&rd=10834

This competition has started and will go through June 20, 2007.  Check out the standings and register here: 
http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=MatchDetails&rd=10834

We also have practice rooms here:  
http://www.topcoder.com/longcontest/?module=ViewPractice&rt=14

To learn more about TopCoder Marathon Matches:
http://www.topcoder.com/longcontest/?module=Static&d1=instructions


Best of luck to you!

- TopCoder Competitions Team 


===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of TopCoder News & Events.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
